direction.raw_text: Kill him! Kill him! Elijah's bloodthirsty goading fades away, and Cowboy's voice reverberates in Rick's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I reckon that troll could help you if you just let him into your heart... your heart... your heart... The voice keeps echoing. A tear wells up in Rick Monster's eye. He looks over at Cowboy, who is actually calling out to him from the cage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your heart... your heart... your heart... Rick Monster loses his murderous glare. He breaks into a warm smile, throws the pipe away and helps Stuey Monster up. They hug. The rest of the Freaks cheer wildly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Atta' boy Coog! (NUDGES WORM) Hey, ain't that somethin'? The Worm is gushing sentimentally. He tries to hide his tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tosh. (Sniff) Sentimental claptrap (Sniff) Shameless, maudlin--Baaa! He can't hold it in anymore. He bawls like a baby. Meanwhile, Elijah is hopping mad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cut the lovey-dovey bullshit, and start mutilating each other! He aims at Rick Monster and presses the fire button. The Glop starts to flow, but before it can make it out of the tip, Rick grabs hold of the nozzle, and twists it around to face Elijah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raarrrrrrgh! Elijah manages to duck just in time. A stream of yellow Noxon 25 glop flies over his shoulder, and lands in the DUNK TANK full of carbolic acid that sits off to one side of the tent. The acid and the Noxon mix together and bubble up menacingly. Elijah hops down out of the gunner's chair and squares off against Rick Monster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Meanwhile, Stuey Monster has released the other freaks from the cage. They watch the confrontation from a distance. Elijah rolls up his sleeves. Rick growls and advances slowly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think I made you strong? HA! I've cranked my DNA up so high, you won't know what hit you. I'm a wrecking machine! Aaaaaaa! He rushes at Rick and delivers a flurry of punches to his mid section. They have absolutely no effect. Rick brings one heavy fist slamming down on Elijah's head, stopping him cold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow! I think you crushed my spinal cord. I can't feel anything in my fingers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you'll feel this ... Rick rears back to kick him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Qait--if you kill me, you'll never find the antidote. The freaks all perk up. Rick's skeptical.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What antidote?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A time release serum--I baked it into a delicious batch of macaroons. A slow smile grows on the Freaks' faces, especially Rick's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you ask me, you skimped on the coconut!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Rick boots Elijah between the legs, sending him flying through the air. He lands on the DUNK TANK SEAT over the bubbling Noxon/Acid. Dazed, he looks at the bullseye target, and back at Rick. Summoning up his last ounce of bravado, Elijah makes a last stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Coogan! Come oooon! You haven't got the guts to kill me! Go on! I dare ya'! Rick ponders for a second. He looks over to Julie. Then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yap! Yap!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scrappy! Scrappy the dog rushes in. He leaps up and presses the bullseye, dropping Elijah into the hideous mixture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Elijah struggles in agony. His body bubbles and mutates in the thick toxic soup. He sinks lower and lower into the gunk, until he and his cries are buried for good. Scrappy leaps into Rick's arms and licks his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yap!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Atta boy, Scrap!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BLAM! The tent flaps fly open and a half dozen FBI AGENTS rush in with guns drawn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Freeze, FBI! Another FBI GUY investigates the dunk tank, sees Elijah's hat floating on top of the bubbling ooze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like they took care of Skuggs, chief. The chief nods. They put away their guns, and approach Rick and the rest of the jubilant freaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice work, Ricky. You'll get a medal from the Vice President for this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great. But how did you--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've been following Skuggs for years. Scrappy just filled in some of the details.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yap!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank heavens you brought him to justice, Rick. God only knows how far his sick plans would've gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey chief, look at this! The FBI guy has peeled the decal off the Pepsi machine, revealing that it's actually a Coke machine! The chief is sickened to the core.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is nothing sacred? Suddenly, the agents are distracted by a terrible scream. They turn to the dunk tank and are shocked by what they see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my Lord!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! It can't be! We SWISH PAN over to reveal a DRIPPING BLOB climbing out of the dunk tank. The blob separates into two distinct entities with their backs to us. They turn around and...my God it's... it's....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Or at least a damn fine mutant imitation of them. Call him/them ELIJUS and ELLY LEE. They both have glowing red demon eyes and speak in Elijah's voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thought you killed me, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell are you looking at?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two pieces of deadmeat!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BLAM! BLAM! The FBI guys open fire. We show only the horrified reactions of the freaks as they look on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rick, Regis, and Kathie Lee are still in silhouette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's my story.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was so exciting!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And long! My God! It makes War and Peace sound like a warm up act!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Okay! We got light!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's fixed? Well, it's about time! The lights come on--no more silhouettes. Ricky looks perfectly normal, his old self. His weird silhouette was caused by a potted plant and some strange hanging mobile behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll say. (TO AUDIENCE) How 'bout it, folks. Let's hear it for Ricky Coogan! The audience applauds and hoots wildly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can we bring out the other freaks now? The audience cheers as the rest of the Freaks walk out from the wings, and stand off to the side waving to the audience. They all look clean cut and happy. They wear T-shirts with their former identities printed on them. "I was NOSEY," "I was COWBOY," "I was the BEARDED LADY" etc. Except the Worm, who's still a worm. His T-shirt says, "I'm Still THE WORM".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ridiculous... Just because a man doesn't like macaroons... Nonsense. Suddenly a squirrel runs across stage, followed by Juan. He pounces and catches the furry little bugger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gotcha! Damn, it's about time!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (happy to see him)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey guys! Jeez! You look great! They all hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's just great. What a story. And what an ending! Elijah transformed by the goop!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And he really looked like--?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly like you two, I swear. Same faces, same outfits, except they had these really big, hideous feet... He looks down at Regis and KATHIE LEE's feet--they're big, hideous monster feet! Suddenly their eyes glow bright red-- It's Elijus and Elly Lee! They speak with Elijah's voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Show's over, Ricky!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna drink your blood! Elly Lee pulls a machete and is about to force it down on Rick's throat when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BANG! BANG! Elijus and Elly Lee's eyes go funny. They look at each other, spit up some blood, wave to the audience one last time, and collapse to the floor. Julie stands behind them, smoking gun in hand. She rushes to Rick. They embrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rick! It's finally over!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes... Yes it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.C.) Rick! Rick! Rick and Julie turn and see Stuey, still a ten foot tall monster, running towards them. He's carrying a garbage bag dripping blood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stuey!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look! I found the real Regis and Kathie Lee! Rick and Julie look at the bag, mortified. Stuey chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, this is just my lunch! Rick and Julie sigh with relief. Stuey pulls out a similar leaking bag and holds it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (matter of fact) This is Regis and Kathie Lee. Rick and Julie nod casually--"Oh."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awwww! Suddenly Elijus and Elly Lee pop up from behind the couch, bloodied, but still fierce. They're about to stab Rick and Julie when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BANG! BANG! BANG! BANG! Five more shots ring out and they fall dead--again. Ernie stands off to the side with a smoking gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, like that wasn't totally predictable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, now it really is over. Sappy END OF THE MOVIE MUSIC wells up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank God. You know, this adventure has taught me something. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When man starts impinging on the subtle perfection of the earth's natural order, the only thing he'll create is havoc.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right, Coog. I learned somethin' too. That men and women truly are equals. That the human spirit transcends gender and physical appearance, and thus it is immune to the petty degradations men may devise. I believe it was Moliere
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julie's had enough. She socks Ernie square on the jaw.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, shut up. (She turns to Rick) Let's go fuck. Rick gives her the thumbs up. They turn to the audience.
direction.name: direction
